languages.text: {n}Иеронимус обнажает почерневшие десны в подобии улыбки.{/n} "Император был милостив ко мне — мое тело искалечилось и истлело, но душа получила шанс смыть хотя бы часть наросшей на ней скверны благостными муками. Нечистоты, в которых я копошился, — ничто супротив мерзости, что я пестовал в себе, выдавая за благо. Я буду носить стигматы своего покаяния с гордостью — пусть все узрят, что путь к раскаянию тернист, но возможен, и я не убоялся заплатить цену".

traits.locale_text: {n}Иеронимус обнажает почерневшие десны в подобии улыбки.{/n} "Император был милостив ко мне — мое тело искалечилось и истлело, но моя душа получила шанс смыть хотя бы часть наросшей на ней скверны благостными муками. Нечистоты, в которых я копошился — ничто, супротив мерзости, что я пестовал в себе, выдавая за благо. Я буду носить стигматы своего покаяния с гордостью, ибо пусть все узрят, что путь к раскаянию тернист, но возможен, и что я не убоялся заплатить цену".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus bares his blackened gums in a semblance of a smile.{/n} "The Emperor was merciful to me: my body is ruined and withered, but my soul received a chance to wash away at least some of the accreted taint through blessed torment. The filth that I had to endure was nothing compared to the vileness that I nurtured within me, passing it off as virtue. I will wear the mark of my penance with pride. Let all see that remorse is a path of thorns, but one that can be walked, and I did not hesitate to pay the price."
languages.original_text: {n}Иеронимус обнажает почерневшие десны в подобии улыбки.{/n} "Император был милостив ко мне — мое тело искалечилось и истлело, но душа получила шанс смыть хотя бы часть наросшей на ней скверны благостными муками. Нечистоты, в которых я копошился, — ничто супротив мерзости, что я пестовал в себе, выдавая за благо. Я буду носить стигматы своего покаяния с гордостью — пусть все узрят, что путь к раскаянию тернист, но возможен, и я не убоялся заплатить цену".

languages.text: {n}ヒエロニムスは黒ずんだ歯茎をむき出しにし、偽りの笑顔を見せる。{/n}「皇帝は私に慈悲をお与えくださった。肉体は滅び枯れ果てたが、魂は祝福された苦痛によって少なくともいくらかの汚れを洗い流す機会を得た。耐えねばならぬ不浄など、美徳のふりをして自身の中に育てていた悪徳に比べればなんでもないことだった。これからは誇りをもって贖罪の印を背負おう。悔恨は茨の道だが歩けない道ではない、そして私はその代償を払うことを躊躇わなかったと、皆に示すのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus bares his blackened gums in a semblance of a smile.{/n} "The Emperor was merciful to me: my body is ruined and withered, but my soul received a chance to wash away at least some of the accreted taint through blessed torment. The filth that I had to endure was nothing compared to the vileness that I nurtured within me, passing it off as virtue. I will wear the mark of my penance with pride. Let all see that remorse is a path of thorns, but one that can be walked, and I did not hesitate to pay the price."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヒエロニムスは黒ずんだ歯茎をむき出しにし、偽りの笑顔を見せる。{/n}「皇帝は私に慈悲をお与えくださった。肉体は滅び枯れ果てたが、魂は祝福された苦痛によって少なくともいくらかの汚れを洗い流す機会を得た。耐えねばならぬ不浄など、美徳のふりをして自身の中に育てていた悪徳に比べればなんでもないことだった。これからは誇りをもって贖罪の印を背負おう。悔恨は茨の道だが歩けない道ではない、そして私はその代償を払うことを躊躇わなかったと、皆に示すのだ」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}Hiéronymus vous dévoile ses gencives noircies dans un semblant de sourire.{/n} « L'Empereur s'est montré clément envers moi : mon corps est détruit et flétri, mais mon âme s'est vu accorder une chance de racheter la corruption accumulée, au moins en partie, par le biais du tourment sacré. Le stupre que j'ai dû endurer n'était rien comparé à l'infamie que j'ai laissé grandir en moi en la faisant passer pour de la vertu. Je porterai la marque de ma pénitence avec fierté, pour que tous puissent voir que le remords est un chemin jonché d'épines, mais que l'on peut le suivre jusqu'au bout et que je n'ai pas hésité à en payer le prix. »
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus bares his blackened gums in a semblance of a smile.{/n} "The Emperor was merciful to me: my body is ruined and withered, but my soul received a chance to wash away at least some of the accreted taint through blessed torment. The filth that I had to endure was nothing compared to the vileness that I nurtured within me, passing it off as virtue. I will wear the mark of my penance with pride. Let all see that remorse is a path of thorns, but one that can be walked, and I did not hesitate to pay the price."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hiéronymus vous dévoile ses gencives noircies dans un semblant de sourire.{/n} « L'Empereur s'est montré clément envers moi : mon corps est détruit et flétri, mais mon âme s'est vu accorder une chance de racheter la corruption accumulée, au moins en partie, par le biais du tourment sacré. Le stupre que j'ai dû endurer n'était rien comparé à l'infamie que j'ai laissé grandir en moi en la faisant passer pour de la vertu. Je porterai la marque de ma pénitence avec fierté, pour que tous puissent voir que le remords est un chemin jonché d'épines, mais que l'on peut le suivre jusqu'au bout et que je n'ai pas hésité à en payer le prix. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}希罗尼穆斯龇着发黑的牙龈，似笑非笑。{/n}“帝皇对我非常仁慈。虽然我的躯体朽烂、枯萎，但我的灵魂却得到了宽恕。我可以通过至福的折磨，洗净灵魂上的部分污点。我此刻不得不忍受的污秽，与我过去灵魂中滋生的邪恶相比，简直不值一提。我把这当成美德，我会骄傲地戴上忏悔的印记，让所有人都看到——忏悔之路遍布荆棘，但并非无法踏足，而我已经毫不犹豫地为过去的罪孽付出了代价。”
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus bares his blackened gums in a semblance of a smile.{/n} "The Emperor was merciful to me: my body is ruined and withered, but my soul received a chance to wash away at least some of the accreted taint through blessed torment. The filth that I had to endure was nothing compared to the vileness that I nurtured within me, passing it off as virtue. I will wear the mark of my penance with pride. Let all see that remorse is a path of thorns, but one that can be walked, and I did not hesitate to pay the price."

traits.locale_text: {n}希罗尼穆斯龇着发黑的牙龈，似笑非笑。{/n}“帝皇对我非常仁慈。虽然我的躯体朽烂、枯萎，但我的灵魂却得到了宽恕。我可以通过至福的折磨，洗净灵魂上的部分污点。我此刻不得不忍受的污秽，与我过去灵魂中滋生的邪恶相比，简直不值一提。我把这当成美德，我会骄傲地戴上忏悔的印记，让所有人都看到——忏悔之路遍布荆棘，但并非无法踏足，而我已经毫不犹豫地为过去的罪孽付出了代价。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus entblößt in einer Art Lächeln sein geschwärztes Zahnfleisch.{/n} "Der Imperator hat mir Gnade erwiesen: Mein Körper ist kaputt und verwelkt, aber meine Seele hat eine Chance erhalten, wenigstens einen Teil der angesammelten Makel durch gesegnete Qual abzuwaschen. Der Schmutz, den ich ertragen musste, war nichts im Vergleich zu der Schändlichkeit, die ich in mir nährte und als Tugend präsentierte. Ich werde das Zeichen meiner Buße mit Stolz tragen. Alle sollen sehen, dass Reue ein dorniger, aber beschreitbarer Weg ist und ich nicht gezögert habe, den Preis zu bezahlen."
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus bares his blackened gums in a semblance of a smile.{/n} "The Emperor was merciful to me: my body is ruined and withered, but my soul received a chance to wash away at least some of the accreted taint through blessed torment. The filth that I had to endure was nothing compared to the vileness that I nurtured within me, passing it off as virtue. I will wear the mark of my penance with pride. Let all see that remorse is a path of thorns, but one that can be walked, and I did not hesitate to pay the price."

Der Schmutz, den ich ertragen musste, war nichts im Vergleich zu der Schändlichkeit, die ich in mir nährte und als Tugend präsentierte. Ich werde das Zeichen meiner Buße mit Stolz tragen. Alle sollen sehen, dass Reue ein dorniger, aber beschreitbarer Weg ist und ich nicht gezögert habe, den Preis zu bezahlen."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus sonríe superficialmente mostrando sus encías ennegrecidas.{/n} «El Emperador ha tenido piedad conmigo: tengo el cuerpo destrozado y marchito, pero he podido purgar parte de la corrupción de mi alma tras pasar por un tormento bendito. La impureza que he tenido que soportar no se compara con la degradación que alimenté en mi interior y consideraba una virtud. Llevaré la marca de mi penitencia con orgullo. Me gustaría que todos vieran que el remordimiento es un camino de espinas, pero uno que puede recorrerse, y yo no dudé cuando tuve que pagar el precio».
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus bares his blackened gums in a semblance of a smile.{/n} "The Emperor was merciful to me: my body is ruined and withered, but my soul received a chance to wash away at least some of the accreted taint through blessed torment. The filth that I had to endure was nothing compared to the vileness that I nurtured within me, passing it off as virtue. I will wear the mark of my penance with pride. Let all see that remorse is a path of thorns, but one that can be walked, and I did not hesitate to pay the price."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus sonríe superficialmente mostrando sus encías ennegrecidas.{/n} «El Emperador ha tenido piedad conmigo: tengo el cuerpo destrozado y marchito, pero he podido purgar parte de la corrupción de mi alma tras pasar por un tormento bendito. La impureza que he tenido que soportar no se compara con la degradación que alimenté en mi interior y consideraba una virtud. Llevaré la marca de mi penitencia con orgullo. Me gustaría que todos vieran que el remordimiento es un camino de espinas, pero uno que puede recorrerse, y yo no dudé cuando tuve que pagar el precio».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus, kararmış diş etlerini ortaya çıkararak gülümsemeye benzer bir ağız hareketi yapıyor.{/n} "İmparator bana merhamet etti. Bedenim çöküp solarken ruhum, kutsanmış azabım sayesinde üzerime yapışan kirin en azından bir kısmını temizleyip atma şansına erişti. Katlanmak zorunda kaldığım kirlilik, içimde büyüyen ve erdem sandığım o kötülüğe kıyasla bir hiçti. Cezamın izini gururla taşıyacağım. Pişmanlığın dikenli bir yol olduğunu ama buna rağmen o yolda yürünmesi gerektiğini ve bedelini ödemeye tereddüt etmediğimi herkes görsün."
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus bares his blackened gums in a semblance of a smile.{/n} "The Emperor was merciful to me: my body is ruined and withered, but my soul received a chance to wash away at least some of the accreted taint through blessed torment. The filth that I had to endure was nothing compared to the vileness that I nurtured within me, passing it off as virtue. I will wear the mark of my penance with pride. Let all see that remorse is a path of thorns, but one that can be walked, and I did not hesitate to pay the price."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus kararmış diş etlerini ortaya çıkararak gülümsemeye benzer bir ağız hareketi yapıyor.{/n} "İmparator bana merhamet etti: Bedenim çöktü ve soldu ama ruhum, kutsanmış acılar yoluyla üzerine yapışmış kirlerin en azından bir kısmını temizleyip atma şansına erişti. Katlanmak zorunda kaldığım kirlilik, içimde büyüyen, erdem sandığım o kötülüğe kıyasla hiçbir şeydi. Cezamın izini gururla taşıyacağım. Pişmanlığın dikenli bir yol olduğunu ama buna rağmen o yolda yürünmesi gerektiğini ve bedelini ödemeye tereddüt etmediğimi herkes görsün."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
